H0.text: what is the name of the speaker of the house of representatives now 2011. John Boehner

H1.text: what is the name of the speaker of the house of representatives now 2011. Steny Hoyer

H2.text: what is the name of the speaker of the house of representatives now 2011. Eric Cantor

H3.text: what is the name of the speaker of the house of representatives now 2011. Nancy Pelosi

A4.text: John Andrew Boehner was unanimously chosen by the House Republicans as their nominee for Speaker in November 2010.

A5.text: He received the gavel from outgoing speaker Pelosi on Wednesday, January 5, 2011.
